channel.title: Disney on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Disney on FinanClub

item.title: DIS
item.description: score:12 Chances: Walt Disney Co has secured enough shareholder votes to defeat a challenge against its board mounted by Nelson Peltz’s hedge fund Trian Fund Management. The entertainment giant’s past handling of Iger’s succession is a key criticism that Trian Partners has raised in pushing for board seats.
